channel.title: RuneInferno 718/725 [QBD] [ECO] [NEW]
channel.description:
[b] [size=36pt]~~RuneInferno718~~[/size][/b]
RuneInferno is a Brand new RSPS which will be as close to rs as it can be (Content Wise) ... This server has been BETA and ALPHA tested for a whole month now and most Bug exploits have been Removed We hope to advertise this server and get many players so this server can be a success... we need everyone of you for us to succeed and be the "Dream Server" for you ... the player's
This is just a rough description of the server as it is still under Construction... Suggestion would be great too :P
Download Link: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90342460/RuneInferno.jar Forums: Coming SOON
Staff List
- Developer - OwnerInferno
- Owner/Funds Handler/Client coder -
- Administrators - Aquarium
- Moderator(s) -
- Donators -
[size=18pt][b] -- Features --[/b][/size]
100% Queen Black Dragon Trivia (Thanks to Apache ah64) Nomad's requiem Quest Full Eco
[color=yellow][size=18pt][b] -- PvM Features --[/b][/size][/color]
Most RS Bosses Perfect PvM Switching and Climate We have all you need for PvM!
[color=green][size=18pt][b] -- PvP Features --[/b][/size][/color]
Perfect Curses and Prayer bonuses and features 100% FULL armour and inventory drops in PvP FunPK will be added!
[size=18pt][b] -- Skilling Features --[/b][/size]
Near RS Skilling 95% Runespan added all 24 skills working or in production
[size=18pt][b] -- Overall Features --[/b][/size]
Online 24/7 Owner (Inferno) Is online and updates server 24/7 No Lagg Pet System High Xp Rates... This server has all the things you need so why not join it?
[size=18pt][b] -- Pictures!!! --[/b][/size]
[size=24pt]MEDIA WILL BE COMING SOON!!!
Credits: OwnerInferno (me) 20% Matrix Team 80%

item.title: RuneInferno 718/725 [QBD] [ECO] [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @RuneSpark RuneSpark
item.description:
@RuneSpark wrote:

[quote=“kingcobra805, post:7, topic:451086”]lmao, your an idiot…
First off this is a leech of the 718/723 Dragonkk Released.
more proof that this is a leech…

Not really a leach since i have converted the line’s of code and made it Eco… plus i gave them credit

  1. you spelt leech wrong…
  2. just because you made it eco dont mean you fixed anything.
  3. “Converted lines of code” lmao, its alot harder than you make it seem.

No offense but did you even fix Pouch Creation, Loading Background’s, Fight Kiln, Stability issues etc?[/quote]

Yes… i have fixed various issues… Pouch Creation is fixed so is stability and Fight Kiln

Read full topic
